description: HTML and embedded JavaScript for a web-based database visualizer interface with sidebar navigation, dynamic data loading, and interactive data tables.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Loads list of databases from API and populates sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes database list and resets current selection.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Toggles display of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders data into an HTML table with dynamic column headers.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates a table cell with data, handling long text and objects.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long text or objects.
